name: Vita Viridis - Green Life
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Five years ago, the Fates -powerful beings of the land- engaged in a battle that stripped the world of magic... and withered the life of the earth. 

Humanity lies on the brink of devastation. However, one lone traveller - chosen by the Fates, sets out to release the stolen magic and rejuvenate the land once more. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vita Viridis - (Green Life) was created over a period of around 5 days as an "Indie Game Maker Competition: Rebirth" entry. This is a very short (15-40min) game featuring a small selection of simple boulder pushing, switch flipping, and logic puzzles.  There is a simple evented action combat system: harness the elemental power of the Fates to shoot ice and engulf yourself in flame!

You will play Feniks, a traveler saved by the Fate of Fire and tasked to trek across the land; setting the world right and restoring the magic stolen away. The game ends after a confrontation with the Fate of Darkness, and adulation from the people saved!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pixel art by Jamie Brownhill, Franuka, and myself. Music by Bit by Bert. 
Please find additional credits and links within the 'Credits.txt' file contained in the download. 

This is the first RPG Maker project I have ever managed to actually complete. Thank you for checking it out!
